NOTE.P: Directive 2013/36/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 June 2013 on access to the activity of credit institutions and the prudential supervision of credit institutions and investment firms, amending Directive 2002/87/EC and repealing Directives 2006/48/EC and 2006/49/EC (OJ L 176, 27.6.2013, p. 338).

ROW.CELL: No
Ancillary services under Regulation (EU) No 909/2014
Types of records

TXT.HT: CSD's non-banking-type ancillary services that do not entail credit or liquidity risks

ROW.CELL: Organising a securities lending mechanism, as agent among participants of a securities settlement system

NP.TXT: Details regarding each securities lending/borrowing operation, including volume and value of securities and ISIN;
Purpose of each securities lending/borrowing operations;

ROW.CELL: Providing collateral management services, as agent for participants in a securities settlement system

NP.TXT: Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities and ISIN;

ROW.CELL: Settlement matching, instruction routing, trade confirmation, trade verification

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities and ISIN.

ROW.CELL: Services related to shareholders' registers

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities and ISIN.

ROW.CELL: Supporting the processing of corporate actions, including tax, general meetings and information services

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities/cash, beneficiaries of the operation and ISIN.

ROW.CELL: New issue services, including allocation and management of ISIN codes and similar codes

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including ISIN.

ROW.CELL: Instruction routing and processing, fee collection and processing and related reporting

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities/cash, beneficiaries of the operation, ISIN and purpose of the operation.

ROW.CELL: Establishing CSD links, providing, maintaining or operating securities accounts in relation to the settlement service, collateral management, other ancillary services

NP.TXT: Details regarding the CSD links, including identification of CSDs;

ROW.CELL: Providing general collateral management services as agent

NP.TXT: Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities, ISIN;

ROW.CELL: Providing regulatory reporting

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides the reporting;
Details regarding the data provided, including the legal basis and the purpose.

ROW.CELL: Providing information, data and statistics to market/census bureaus or other governmental or inter-governmental entities

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding the data provided, including the legal basis and the purpose.

ROW.CELL: Providing IT services

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides the services;

TXT.HT: CSD's banking-type services directly related to core or ancillary services listed in Sections A and B of the Annex to Regulation (EU) No 909/2014

ROW.CELL: Providing cash accounts to, and accepting deposits from, participants in a securities settlement system and holders of securities accounts, within the meaning of point 1 of Annex I to Directive 2013/36/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;

ROW.CELL: Providing cash credit for reimbursement no later than the following business day, cash lending to pre-finance corporate actions and lending securities to holders of securities accounts, within the meaning of point 2 of Annex I to Directive 2013/36/EU.

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities/cash, ISIN;
Information about any incidents in relation to such services and remediating actions including follow-up.

ROW.CELL: Payment services involving processing of cash and foreign exchange transactions, within the meaning of point 4 of Annex I to Directive 2013/36/EU

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including volume of cash, and purpose of operation.

ROW.CELL: Guarantees and commitments related to securities lending and borrowing, within the meaning of point 6 of Annex I to Directive 2013/36/EU

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities/cash and purpose of operation.

ROW.CELL: Treasury activities involving foreign exchange and transferable securities related to managing participants' long balances, within the meaning of points 7(b) and (e) of Annex I to Directive 2013/36/EU

NP.TXT: Identification of the entities for which the CSD provides such services;
Details regarding each operation, including volume and value of securities/cash and purpose of operation.
